title: How to Make Butternut Squash Soup

steps.headline: Peel the squash with a veggie peeler, split in half and remove the seeds.
Add peeled fresh ginger, garlic and stir.
steps.description: then add the stock and bring to a boil.

steps.headline: Lower to simmer and cook until the squash is tender.
steps.description: Add salt and pepper to taste.

steps.headline: Puree in batches in the blender.
Add heavy cream until you have a taste and consistency you like.

text: Peel the squash with a veggie peeler, split in half and remove the seeds. Cut into manageable squares. Sauté 1 onion in olive oil. Add the squash and stir. Add peeled fresh ginger, garlic and stir. then add the stock and bring to a boil. Lower to simmer and cook until the squash is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Puree in batches in the blender.  Add heavy cream until you have a taste and consistency you like. Serve hot or cold. Finished.
